name: ClockMok
description:
Clockmok is holding you hostage and throws you through different dimensions. Collect all stopwatches in the dimensions to stop him. But be beware of his Timelimit.

Controls:

WASD or  arrow keys to move

SPACE to attack / jump (depending on current game)

This game was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Footnote:

The idea for the genre shifting mechanic came from a coworker. I thought  it  was great but turns out that I overscoped very hard. Guess developing 3 different games instead of focusing on one is hard (Duh). But despite the sleepness saturday night I had a lot of fun, even though im not quite satisfied with the result.
